segments.text: How can she just stand there drying dishes while the sink floods the kitchen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing out, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she doesn't even flinchâ€”unbelievable negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor kids are climbing everywhere, and she's not watching them at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that rickety stool, about to topple over for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're raiding the cookie jar like it's no big deal, breaking all the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked high on the counter, ready to crash if someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is perfect, but inside it's a total mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of carelessness drives me up the wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before the whole place is underwater.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing the danger right under their noses.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how routine tasks blind people to real hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets and spilling water just make it all worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
